prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumbWeekly
Title: Urban Gardening: A Guide to Growing Your Own Food in Small Spaces
Description: Learn how to maximize your urban space for food production. From vertical gardens to container gardening, we provide a step-by-step guide to help city dwellers become self-sustaining.
No, I am not interested in gardening.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: WorldHistoryDigest
Title: The Influence of Ancient Civilizations on Modern Architecture
Description: Delve into the intricate world of architectural design, tracing its roots back to ancient civilizations. Discover how their groundbreaking ideas continue to shape our skylines even today.
I might find that slightly interesting. Anything else?

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureSpace 
Title: 5 Upcoming NASA Missions That Will Change Our Understanding of the Universe 
Description: Get a first look at NASA's next-generation space missions that are set to launch in the coming decade. These groundbreaking initiatives aim to answer fundamental questions about our universe and could redefine our understanding of space and time.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodieParadise
Title: Molecular Gastronomy: The Science Behind Your Favorite Dishes
Description: Dive into the fascinating world of molecular gastronomy and learn how renowned chefs use scientific principles to create unique culinary experiences. This article takes you behind the scenes of some of the most innovative kitchens around the globe.
I am not much of a chef or a foodie but that article sounds interesting.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumTech
Title: Unveiling Quantum Computers: The Future of Data Processing and Cybersecurity
Description: Get an in-depth look at how Quantum Computers work, the potential they hold for revolutionizing data processing, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity. This article breaks down complex quantum mechanics into simple, understandable concepts for non-technical readers.
I'm not much of a techie but that article sounds interesting.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FashionForward
Title: The Evolution of Fashion: A Journey from the 1920s to Now
Description: Take a voyage through the transformative world of fashion over the last century. This article provides a comprehensive look at how societal changes have shaped fashion trends and how these trends have, in turn, influenced culture. From flapper dresses to sustainable fashion, we cover it all.
I might be slightly interested in reading that article however I don't care much about fasion.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalEcoNews
Title: Climate Change & Biodiversity: The Impact and Solutions for a Sustainable Future
Description: This article explores the current state of biodiversity on our planet, how climate change impacts it, and what solutions are being put in place to ensure a sustainable future. Dive into the complexities of ecological balance and the science of climate change, while understanding what steps individuals and societies can take to mitigate its effects.
That doesn't sound interesting to me at all.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
